raw_body: RAJANATHAN – YOGAM passed away peacefully on 24th September. Beloved wife of late Rajanathan,​ loving sister of late sisters of Sivapakiam Kanagasuriam,​ late Maheswary Sri Pathmanthan,​ late Parameswary Thiagarajah,​ late Soundramani Sri Pathmaraja,​ Swarnam Sivaramaligam. Viewing at Mahinda Funeral Directors,​ Mount Lavinia from 2.00-4.00 p.m. Monday,​ 25th September 2023 at 4.00 p.m. for cremation at Mt. Lavinia Crematorium.060924
